text: When Sun is placed in the 1 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of the Self, appearance, and general vitality. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding the Self.

When Sun is placed in the 2 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of accumulated wealth, family, and speech. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding accumulated wealth.

When Sun is placed in the 3 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of siblings, courage, and self-effort. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding siblings.

When Sun is placed in the 4 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of mother, home, land, and happiness. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding mother.

When Sun is placed in the 5 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of children, intelligence, and speculation. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding children.

When Sun is placed in the 6 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of enemies, debts, and diseases. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding enemies.

When Sun is placed in the 7 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of marriage, partnership, and legal bindings. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding marriage.

When Sun is placed in the 8 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of longevity, transformation, and occult knowledge. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding longevity.

When Sun is placed in the 9 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of dharma, father, guru, and fortune. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding dharma.

When Sun is placed in the 10 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of career, reputation, and social standing. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding career.

When Sun is placed in the 11 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of gains, older siblings, and networks. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding gains.

When Sun is placed in the 12 House, it brings the energy of authority, vitality, and the soul into the domain of losses, liberation, and foreign residence. This placement may require discipline or intensity regarding losses.
